<title level="1" right="Action">[Telekinetic Assault](/Actions.aspx?ID=1169) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 38

**Frequency** once per hour

</column>

---

Your ghost unleashes a flurry of emotions, causing small objects and debris to fly about in a 20-foot emanation, dealing 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 2 levels the ghost has ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) Reflex save). This uses a trained DC using the ghost's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the ghost is specialized.
name: Telekinetic Assault
